---
name: Subschema request
about: Request a specific subschema for a standard (ISO/DIN/VDA/etc.)
labels: subschema
---

## Standard/protocol

Which standard (e.g., ISO 17025, DIN, VDA) does this request relate to?

## Intended use

Why do you need this subschema? What is the use case?

## Data requirements

What data fields and constraints are needed in the subschema?

## Example(s)

Provide an example or mockup of the desired subschema structure.

## Official documentation/specs

Links to relevant specs or documentation (if any).

## Potential impact/use cases

Who would benefit from this? Any additional context.
